name: Charmander
description: A small, lizard-like Pokémon, it has a flame at the end of its tail that glows when it's happy. When it's angry, the flame burns more intensely.

name: Squirtle
description: A small, blue, turtle-like Pokémon. It has a large, hard shell on its back that it uses for defense and protection.

name: Bulbasaur
description: A small, green, reptilian creature with a large plant bulb on its back. It absorbs sunlight and uses it for energy.

name: Pikachu
description: A small, yellow, mouse-like creature with electrical powers. It can store electricity in its cheeks and release it in a powerful shock.

name: Jigglypuff
description: A small, round, pink, fairy-like creature. It has the power to sing a lullaby that puts anyone who hears it to sleep.

name: Gengar
description: A dark, shadowy Pokémon that can pass through walls and other solid objects. It can also cause nightmares in people who sleep near it.

name: Mewtwo
description: A powerful, genetically-engineered Pokémon with psychic powers. It was created in a laboratory and is said to be one of the strongest Pokémon in existence.

name: Dragonite
description: A large, dragon-like Pokémon that can fly. It has powerful wings and can create strong gusts of wind with them.

name: Eevee
description: A small, furry creature with the ability to evolve into different forms depending on the environment and conditions it is exposed to.

name: Snorlax
description: A large, sleepy Pokémon that spends most of its time eating and sleeping. It can become very aggressive if it is awakened from its nap.
